entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 27 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 37 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 33. POP 30%
